links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
example: a(7)=2 since 9 is closest square to 7 and |9-7|=2.
prog: (Haskell)a053188 0 = 0a053188 n = min (n - last xs) (head ys - n) where   (xs,ys) = span (< n) a000290_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 28 2011
